feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 08 Oct 2023 08:03:40
entry.summary:
Tech:
- Dockerized local and offline backing up of PostgreSQL with rotation, compression
- HVM updates: simplifications, finally runs on GPUs, 80x speedup on RTX 4090
- Overcoming Hallucinations in AI: How Factually Augmented RLHF Optimizes Vision-Language Alignment in Large Multimodal Models
- Toyota Will Adopt Tesla-Style Cast Bodies That Might Be Impossible to Fix
- How to customize colors in dark and light modes in Material UI

Business:
- USA paying more interest on its $33T debt than on defense – who holds the IOUs
- Permission Slip: Consumer Reports app to take back control of your data
- MGM didn’t pay up after hackers broke into its system and stole customer data
- Sam Altman backs teens’ startup, Google unveils the Pixel 8 and TikTok tests an ad-free tier
- The leading Democratic challenger to Lauren Boebert raised $3.4 million in the third quarter, a mega haul that comes as the GOP congresswoman has faced widespread criticism over her public conduct
- Dear SaaStr: How Long Should It Take to Negotiate a VC Term Sheet?

AI:
- Overcoming Hallucinations in AI: How Factually Augmented RLHF Optimizes Vision-Language Alignment in Large Multimodal Models

Others:
- 1400 year old gold foil figures found in Norwegian pagan temple
- Where to watch WWE Fastlane live streams: See John Cena, LA Knight, and more
- User data stolen from genetic testing giant 23andMe is now for sale on the dark web
- Show HN: Display all stories and comments for a specific Hacker News user
- FTX "insurance fund" calculated by multiplying trading volume by random number
- Show HN: Timbre – An app that finds the best sounds for your sleep
- FTC: Stop falling for social media scams, you've given crooks $650M+ this year
- Doctors Without Borders says healthcare facilities 'cannot become targets' after Israeli forces struck a hospital and ambulance in Gaza
- Jewish institutions in the US are on guard following Hamas' attack on Israel
- Israeli officials are calling on armed civilians to stand guard following Hamas attacks
- Republican Rep. Tim Burchett says he 'slept like a baby' after voting to remove Kevin McCarthy as speaker
- An EasyJet flight was forced to make an emergency landing due to a disruptive passenger who attacked a man with a carrier bag
- Free Ireland vs. Scotland live stream: Where to watch Rugby World Cup online from anywhere
- Israel's war with Hamas could increase competition for the US artillery shells needed by Ukraine

Insights:
- The USA's debt and interest payments are a significant concern, potentially impacting defense spending.
- Data breaches and hacking incidents continue to pose a threat to businesses, with MGM being a recent victim.
- The tech industry is constantly evolving, with advancements in areas such as Dockerization, AI, and material UI customization.
- Political and international conflicts, such as the situation between Israel and Hamas, have implications beyond their immediate regions.
- Consumer protection and awareness regarding scams and data privacy remain important issues.
- Fundraising and investment activities in the business sector continue to shape the startup landscape.
